description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he's passionate about transforming education and knowledge sharing. He founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on bringing people together around common values and translating shared visions into effective ecosystems. His work explores concepts like ecosystem architecture, decentralization, and regenerative design, applying them to digital landscapes, innovation, and sustainable communities. yeehaa's articles and courses cover topics ranging from internet fragmentation to collaborative practices, emphasizing the importance of diversity, open sharing, and adaptive systems in addressing global challenges.
